1.title: Stacking Stones
1.plot: Zoomba finds Babatua stacking stones as an exercise in balance. But when Zoomba rushes to do it himself, and the two find themselves trapped on the lake under the night stars, he learns that balance applies to more than just the rocks.

2.title: Color Brave
2.plot: In a very special ZAFARI episode, the mysterious Lulu brings her fellow Butterfly-Horses to ZAFARI for annual picture day. But when Zoomba tries to see them all the same in an attempt to not have Lulu feel jealous, he learns that we should not be color blind, but color brave. Based on an idea by Mellody Hobson.

3.title: Maim That Tune
3.plot: Zoomba helps Quincy learn that new skills - even ridiculous ones - require patience and practice to master.

4.title: Thorn in his Side
4.plot: Zoomba and Quincy help Antonio remove a thorn from his paw. But the real irritation comes from Quincy's belief that he is owed something in return.

5.title: Quincy's a Genius
5.plot: Quincy is tasked with collecting coconuts on a hot day, but believes that, with Zoomba's help, he can invent a better way to achieve his goal.

6.title: The Magic Fig
6.plot: Zoomba is eager to win the clean-up competition after a landslide hits Zafari but Frick and Frack engage in a negativity campaign to rattle his self-confidence. Babatua and Antonio offer him a magic fig to help Zoomba regain his confidence.

7.title: The Road Trip
7.plot: Zoomba finds Babatua stacking stones as an exercise in balance. But when Zoomba rushes to do it himself, and the two find themselves trapped on the lake under the night stars, he learns that balance applies to more than just the rocks.

8.title: The Masterpiece
8.plot: Zoomba and Quincy set out to help Colette find paints in hopes she will let them assist with her latest masterpiece. But the two discover that sometimes, the journey is more important than the destination.

9.title: Just for Laughs
9.plot: Zoomba realizes that Antonio rarely laughs. So the ZAFARIANS challenge each other to see who can be first to make him laugh, realizing in the end, that senses of humor are as varied as the ZAFARIANS themselves.

10.title: What's in a (Nick) Name?
10.plot: Zoomba and Quincy invent nicknames for each other, but quickly learn that it's not a good game when feelings can get hurt.

11.title: Summer Break
11.plot: Zoomba and the other Zafarians work to make the lake water's edge the perfect holiday spot. They intend to set up palm trees as umbrellas, create a floating rafts and a diving board. But in order to do so, they almost destroy what they have, causing all to learn a lesson about thinking things through and protecting our natural environment.

12.title: Sneeze the Day
12.plot: It's Lei Day in ZAFARI, but Zoomba and Quincy can't stop sneezing, leading them to believe they are allergic to each other. But are they?

13.title: Eye of the Beholder
13.plot: Colette accidentally stares at the sun and needs to cover her eyes for a few days to allow them to heal. In the process, Zoomba helps her to experience the world through her other senses.

14.title: Who's Jokin Whom?
14.plot: The ZAFARIANS aren't getting along, and so one decides nothing will lighten the mood like a few practical jokes. But who is the mastermind behind them all?

15.title: Who's on First?
15.plot: Zoomba and Quincy plan to meet at Zafari's Moss Rock at a specific time, but due to unforeseen circumstances, they miss each other. Pokey is in the middle of it however, as he fell into a ditch and neither Zoomba nor Quincy listen to his need for help.

16.title: Bye Bye Birdie
16.plot: When a flock of birds blocks the sun, Zoomba decides Mother Nature is too unpredictable and refuses to come out of his tree house. Quincy and Pokey concoct a plan to bring him out, but it goes awry almost instantly.

17.title: Away with Words
17.plot: A language misunderstanding causes Renalda to think Ernesto has insulted her. Embarassed, Ernesto curls into his ball and won't come out. So it's up to Zoomba and Quincy to figure out how to get the two friends back together.

18.title: Crossing a Lion
18.plot: Antonio the lion acts out when he's not asked his opinion about what the group should do for fun. And Zoomba learns that only one thing will solve the problem.

19.title: A ZAFARI Zelebration
19.plot: It's Zoomba and Quincy's first Zafari Zelebration. They struggle to find the right gift for each other but learn that it's the thought that counts the most.

20.title: The Everything Tree
20.plot: Zoomba is pressured by the other ZAFARIANS to get a magical fruit at the top of a dangerously tall tree. But his learns that letting others tell him what to do is not a good idea and he must make his own choices.

21.title: Rock Around the Clock
21.plot: Zoomba and Quincy help Spike with his rock collecting hobby. But when Quincy and Spike both claim possession of a prized jewel, Zoomba must teach Quincy that finder does not always mean keeper.

22.title: Takes One to Know One
22.plot: Quincy disappears. So Zoomba decides he needs to act like Quincy in order to find him - a tricky task indeed. It all comes down to being considerate and having the courtesy to share information.

23.title: A ZAFARI Delegation
23.plot: When an accident causes the daily chore assignments to get mixed up, Renalda decides she has to do everything herself. But Zoomba helps her realize that doesn't usually work out.

24.title: You Snooze You Lose
24.plot: When a tree has grown so tall it covers the vegetable garden in shadow, Zoomba's indecisiveness about what to do leads to the problem getting worse than it necessary.

25.title: Goo Team Goo
25.plot: After a sleep-over party lit by the glowing goo balls, Zoomba and the others must clean up. But without a plan and coordination among the helpers, Zoomba realizes that they are actually making an even bigger mess.

26.title: Zoomba's Choice
26.plot: As a storm bears down on ZAFARI, Zoomba realizes his friends might be in danger and he must make some hard decisions to get himself and the others to safety.

1.title: Sore Winners
1.plot: When Zoomba and Quincy win the annual ZAFARI foot race, it seems their prize is to be servants to all the losers. But the real prize is something much more special.

2.title: Tree for Two
2.plot: A windy night destroys Quincy's sleeping branch, so Zoomba offers that Quincy stay with him. But it doesn't work out as planned.

3.title: Getting to Know Renalda
3.plot: Zoomba gets on Renalda's bad side, and must spend the day doing her bidding. But in doing so, he learns that she is not what she appears to be and the two grow their friendship.

4.title: Zoomba in Charge
4.plot: When Babatua sees that Zoomba is not standing up for himself, he leaves ZAFARI for a day and places Zoomba in charge. Yet it's Quincy who takes advantage of the power, and Zoomba must learn how to be a strong leader.

5.title: Cave In
5.plot: Pokey and Quincy drive each other crazy, but when Zoomba accidentally traps them in a cave, they learn that those with even the biggest differences do have a lot in common after all.

6.title: Frick & Fractured
6.plot: Frick and Frack are best friends, but when a small disagreement turns them away from each other, Zoomba must invent a way for the two to re-unite.

7.title: Funk in the Trunk
7.plot: Zoomba hurts his trunk and while healing, Quincy decides to help him by doing everything Zoomba's trunk does. But when things go awry, Zoomba learns that feelings can be hurt too.

8.title: Big Night
8.plot: Everybody in ZAFARI seems to be fighting until Babatua announces the imminent arrival of a special dinner guest. As they work together to prepare, the ZAFARIANS come to the realization that the guest may be an even bigger surprise than first thought.

9.title: The Soundmaker
9.plot: Zoomba feels unheard, but when local ZAFARIAN scientist Elspeth gives him a sound making device that solves the problem, it also creates a new one.

10.title: Jumping to Conclusions
10.plot: Somebody's been playing pranks on the sleeping ZAFARIANS each night, leading Zoomba to launch an investigation with surprising results.

11.title: Hi, Jinx!
11.plot: When everything goes wrong for him, Zoomba think he's jinxed. But is it all in his head?

12.title: Trading Places
12.plot: Pokey and Antonio don't think the others' role is important. So Zoomba suggests they switch jobs for the day, with some very unintended consequences.

13.title: The Pokey Must Go On
13.plot: It's the day of the annual ZAFARIAN Talent Show. But when Pokey assumes he'll be the host and doesn't give it enough attention, Babatua gives the honor to Zoomba.

14.title: Apples and Pumpkins and Grapes, Oh My!
14.plot: Due to a little mishap, Zoomba and Quincy each think the other is mad at him. They search for each other to try to makes amends, and come to the realization that true friendship can move past misunderstandings.

15.title: Quincy in Love
15.plot: Quincy is infatuated with another monkey and gets help from his fellow ZAFARIANS, each with their own specific advice. But Zoomba helps him to learn that only by being himself can one truly achieve what they desire.

16.title: No More Chores
16.plot: Babatua lets the ZAFARIANS skip their chores for the day, but when it causes all sorts or problems, Zoomba realizes that the chores each have a purpose.

17.title: Quest for Fire
17.plot: Quincy doesn't think things through and extinguishes ZAFARI's only source of fire. So he must go with Zoomba, Antonio and Bubba to get more from the Valley of Flames and in doing so, they learn that there is a time and place for improvisation.

18.title: And the Oscar Goes To...
18.plot: All the ZAFARIANS come down with a bad cough except Zoomba. So he must travel alone to the bamboo forest in order to obtain the medicine.

19.title: Mission Swimpossible
19.plot: Zoomba decides to teach Quincy how to swim - a tricky task since Quincy refuses to get in the water.

20.title: Abracazoomba
20.plot: Zoomba is frustrated that Quincy is either talking constantly or sleeping, never allowing Zoomba a chance to speak. A magic trick from Oscar is his chance to get Quincy to pay attention to him - or is it?

21.title: Sports Day
21.plot: It's time for the annual ZAFARIAN sports competition. But when Quincy offers to train him, Zoomba takes a different path to victory.

22.title: Stop and Smell the Hippo
22.plot: Zoomba runs from one adventure to another, never taking the time to enjoy any one. So Babatua asks him to spend the day with the Bubba, who teaches Zoomba that it's also important to slow down.

23.title: Lulu
23.plot: Zoomba discovers a potential intruder in ZAFARI. But perhaps, not is all it seems, and we come across a special new friend and an equally special new way of looking at the world.

24.title: The Bear Facts
24.plot: ZAFARIAN pandas Xiang and Fan seems to always be arguing. But when Zoomba endeavors to find something that they can agree upon, it's not what he expected.

25.title: Help me Renalda
25.plot: The ZAFARIANS decide to make friendship bracelets, but when Renalda has a problem, Zoomba learns that friendship means you accept others they way they are.

26.title: Treasure Quest!
26.plot: Quincy thinks he's found treasure at the bottom of the lake. Zoomba helps him get it and they discover that everyone has a different idea of what makes something special.

imdb.plot outline: A baby elephant magically with zebra stripes, a giraffe with peacock feathers, and a pink flamingo colored lion. These are just some of the one-of-a-kind animals found in ZAFARI, a valley at the foot of Mt. Kilimanjaro where you can learn, grow, have fun, and most importantly, celebrate that which makes us each unique. Because sometimes being different, makes all the difference."
imdb.title: Zafari
plot: A baby elephant magically with zebra stripes, a giraffe with peacock feathers, and a pink flamingo colored lion. These are just some of the one-of-a-kind animals found in ZAFARI, a valley at the foot of Mt. Kilimanjaro where you can learn, grow, have fun, and most importantly, celebrate that which makes us each unique. Because sometimes being different, makes all the difference."
